text: Oh nina enikholwayo! Gcwalisani izethembiso nivunyelwe (ukudla) izilwaneeziyizinkomongaphandlekwalezoenitshelwa ngazo, ukuzingela akuvumelekile uma nina nisesimweni se- ihraam (amashidi amabili amhlophe agqokwa umuntu owenza iHajj noma i-Umrah) ngempela uMvelinqangi uphoqa (wehlulela) lokho akuthandayo
